text: jo log eemaan lae aur unhonne achchhe karm kie unhen shubh soochana de do ki unake lie aise baag hai jinake neeche naharen bah raheen hogee; jab bhee unamen se koee phal unhen rojee ke roop mein milega, to kahenge, "yah to vahee hain jo pahale hamen mila tha," aur unhen milata-julata hee (phal) milega; unake lie vahaan paak-saaf patni yaan hogee, aur ve vahaan sadaiv rahenge
